section.heading: Audit.
section.text: The Auditor of the District of Columbia shall cause to be conducted a regular post audit of all accounts and transactions of the Chief Financial Officer with respect to the operation of lottery and daily numbers games.

annotations.annotation: For temporary (90 days) amendment of this section, see § 2(d)(8) of Sports Wagering Lottery Emergency Amendment Act of 2018 (D.C. Act 22-630, Jan. 30, 2019, 66 DCR 1745).
